name: Send data to an HTTP endpoint for every new email received
description: Streamline your email management process with this template! Every time a new email arrives in your inbox, Make will automatically send the email data to a specified URL using an HTTP request. This integration allows you to efficiently capture and process incoming emails, ensuring that important information is never missed and can be easily routed to your desired application or service for further action. Perfect for automating workflows and enhancing productivity.
